text: Adi Nugroho (born 3 September 1992) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga 2 club Mitra Kukar. ==Career== ===Mitra Kukar=== Nugroho was signed by Mitra Kukar to play in Liga 2 in the 2019 season. ==References== ==External links== * Adi Nugroho at Liga Indonesia * Adi Nugroho at Soccerway Category:1992 births Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Living people Category:People from Samarinda Category:Association football forwards Category:Semen Padang F.C. players
title: Adi Nugroho
